revised_title: Steady Broadside Motion of an Anchor Ring in an Infinite Viscous Liquid
tldr: The authors study the steady motion of an anchor ring in an infinite viscous liquid. They analyze the motion of the liquid, the vorticity, and the stream function to determine the resistance to the motion. The research provides a mathematical understanding of the fluid dynamics involved in this specific scenario.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Fluid Dynamics
